entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
